sentences.sContent: Young people don’t feel they have a stake in the country’s future.
sentences.sCn: 年轻人觉得自己与国家的未来没有关系。

synos.tran: 资助，支持；系…于桩上；把…押下打赌

phrases.pCn: 危如累卵；处于危险中；在紧要关头
为某人取得某物而提供金钱(或援助)，资助某人取得某物
监视；立桩标出；派警察监视
在...上打赌；把赌注押在...上面

remMethod.val: s + take(带来) → 带来赌金 → 赌金

trans.tranOther: if you have a stake in something, you will get advantages if it is successful, and you feel that you have an important connection with it
